website_summaries.verdict: A reliable, simple, and affordable pan that cooks an even dozen muffins reliably.
pros: Muffins come out of this pan easily
Pan sits in the oven flat for even cooking
A  quality pan from a company with a good name in bakeware
cons: Some say their muffins and cupcakes bake faster than expected in this pan

customer_reviews.title: I ALWAYS come back to this pan
customer_reviews.text: I have every cupcake pan made on the market, even very expensive ones. I always come back to this pan, always. It is superior to the other pans. I can also fit two side by side in my full size oven with room for air to circulate. Some of the other pans are too wide so the pans touch or are too long and the oven door hits the pan. These are perfect and always bake evenly. The expensive pans I bought from a high end kitchen store was a waste of money but THESE pans are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Forensic Doc

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick for sure
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make baked eggs. The eggs came right out, and I didn't have to spend 15 minutes scrubbing it like I did with my other muffin tin. There was no egg left behind and it took less then 3 minutes to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anneliese

customer_reviews.title: Wilton Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product. Metal is very heavy duty. The quality is up there with the rest of Wilton's products that I have been using for over 40 years. I baked corn muffins and they came out perfectly brown and golden. I can’t really speak to the non-stick properties of the pan because I used muffin cups but batter I spilled on the top cleaned up easily. Don't wash in the dishwasher or scrub hard as that will ruin the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Flava

customer_reviews.title: RUSTS - They do not stand by their supposed 5 year warranty either
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these muffin pans - at first I loved them. But they soon rusted. I reached out to Wilson directly because they claim to have a 5 year warranty - they don't stand by their warranty at all. This is a terribly company with terrible products. I also owned a loaf pan that quickly rusted as well, and it was the same story all over again. Stick to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: dousto

customer_reviews.title: Great muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: Great muffin pan. Used this to bake blueberry muffins for the first time in my life. I used butter to grease the pans instead of liners because I didn't have any on hand and the muffins popped right out cleanly without even a single crumb stuck onto the pan. Looking forward to using this for future baking adventures. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wishwatanabe

customer_reviews.title: I dont like, there is a place where food can get ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont like, there is a place where food can get stuck inside (underneath the top area) Its metal that they place on top, I only buy baking products that have a seemed lined for easy cleaning. Its very hard to clean this area and will just throw out because I dont want to deal with bacteria forming especially for eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Thw muffin come out easily, which was a problem with my other tin, It cooks evenly and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I would recommend this to a friend to buy. the price was reasonable which is also a plus. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: JanW

customer_reviews.title: Burned everything
customer_reviews.text: Everything burned. I thought it was my new oven? Temps measured normal. Thought it was the paper liners? Tried multiple. Cooking less time. Nothing helped. Pan was the only common denominator.
customer_reviews.author: cdelight

customer_reviews.title: Stellar product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan. Not only did I not know of this company but it turns out they made my hubby’s “antique” table-top vice! I love the ease of cleaning and the non-stick properties. Great pan all-in-all!
customer_reviews.author: Cackiee

customer_reviews.title: and it makes cleaning the pan super easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've made lots of yummy muffins in this pan without liners, and never have problems with anything sticking! I do spritz a little cooking spray on beforehand, but everything comes right out, and it makes cleaning the pan super easy.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick and great for portion control
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick banking pan. I started using this for baking breakfast egg muffins. It works great so I'm getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Muffin Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently upgraded many items in my kitchen based on America's Test Kitchen and Amazon reviews. They didn't steer me wrong! This pan is excellent; well made, & easy to clean ... and a great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: SE1964

customer_reviews.title: Solid and baked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy metal which I had never had in a pan before but now I won't buy from anyone else. Clean easy even the day after or if you accidentally burn a bit on. Stains slightly if you leave stuff on it or it burns but it doesn't seem to affect how it works. Fine stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cas Herring

customer_reviews.title: Love these!  They'd make a great gift for a wedding!
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan is awesome. I ordered two of them right off the bat. I've owned them for over a year and have used them tons of times and they're always great. They're a nice sturdy metal and don't feel cheap at all. I've used them with and without cupcake papers (liners?) and they work great in both instances. They clean up so easily. I've even made muffins that had a crunchy sugar/buttery bottom to them and I was afraid of how clean-up would go but the baked-on caramelized topping washed out just by dunking the pan in water! If anyone I know is looking for muffin pans, I recommend these wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Jay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Certainly not non stick.
customer_reviews.text: Worst muffin pan ever. Everything sticks and breaks off leaving bottom of muffin stuck in pan. Cannot use unless paper cups are placed first. Wilton you really messed up. (At least on mine!)
customer_reviews.author: EX PAT.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: I came here purposely to find this muffin pan. I got one with the Wilton cake carrier, but I make enough muffins now that I wanted an extra one. IThis replaces two smaller pans that hold six muffins each and don't bake evenly. I never have a problem with this baking unevenly. Other reviewers claimed the pan was difficult to clean because food got stuck in the seams, but I have not had that experience. I just leave it to soak in the sink while the muffins bake, and it's perfectly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M. Good

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I was going to buy two more of these, but I see the price has almost doubled since I bought them one month ago. Sad panda is sad... Wilton quality at an amazing price. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh Force

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more
customer_reviews.text: I had to scrub the egg from the muffins out and use a toothpick around the welded grooves. The muffins didn't just pop out, they left residue. I didn't spray the pan because I thought it would work the first time, but alas, I'll be spraying or using muffin papers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grady

customer_reviews.title: It's a cupcake pan
customer_reviews.text: First off, I'm not a chef. I don't even really like to cook or bake. But sometimes, my daughter convinces me to bake cupcakes or muffins. Or, I get signed up to bring something to a daycare party by my husband. My old cupcake pan got rusty from leaving it in the dishwasher (I am not a housecleaner either). This one seems nice. I've made a couple of things and nothing really stuck to it. It washes well, too. I haven't put it in the dishwasher yet. Probably shouldn't, right?
customer_reviews.author: kansas teacher

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, NO MORE RUST!
customer_reviews.text: This cupcake pan is great. We actually bought two. It is inexpensive, has a good quality non-stick coating, and is rust-resistant. Our old cheap quality cupcake pan was growing so much rust that we finally had to toss it in the recycle bin. This has been a wonderful replacement and has exceeded our expectations. It's easy to clean and the quality is top notch for the price. I would recommend this to anyone who is tired rusting cupcake pans and is ready for a much needed upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff P.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The shallow cups and non-stick coating make for muffins that don't fall apart and come out easily, and cleaning it is just a matter of wiping it down with a sponge. Burnt-on bits normally pop off whole with just a little pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Hielo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My muffins cook evenly using the this Wilton cupcake pan. The drips that bake on just wipe right off in water after finished cooking. Definitely lives up to its name of "nonstick".The weight is sturdy enough that the pan does not wobble or warp as it goes in and out of the oven, but not too heavy for painful hands to be able to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cupcake and muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: Terrific pan. My 9 year old granddaughter bakes during her weekly visits with us and it works very well. Easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D. Matuskey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty self explanatory, grease up the pan & your muffin's will come out great, easy to use & clean.
customer_reviews.author: GPolanco

customer_reviews.title: ♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my cupcake pans! These are some great quality pans and they wipe off very easily. I bake cupcakes, mini pies etc in these pans a few times a month. They hold up very well even with me sometimes using utensils to "scoop" my little desserts out, I don't have a single scratch on either pan after months of labor. You won't be disappointed with these pans from Wilton!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam G

customer_reviews.title: Such a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal on Amazon for a cupcake/muffin tin. It's crazy how much just a standard cupcake tin goes for in stores. I just needed a simple muffin tin for breakfasts on the go and moderate cupcake baking. The nonstick is great and works well, I made a batch of banana oatmeal muffins without spraying any oil onto the pan and the muffins popped out perfectly. My muffins were perfectly cooked, the pan distributes heat evenly. Even some burnt spots from the batter on top washed away easily. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as part of several Wilton baking pans for our son in his new apartment. This is the same muffin pan I have used in our kitchen for many years. I'm sure that his will work well and last a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Compares well to Farberware muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: After losing myI needed a replacement. I liked the Farberware muffin pan I had, but when looking at prices I couldn't justify spending almost twice as much on the Farberware as opposed to this Wilton muffin pan. I was hesitant, but I decided to take the chance on this Wilton pan. I'm so glad I did!!! It has excellent non-stick properties just as my Farberware did (although I still always coat the pan with non-stick cooking spray just to be safe). I think I actually prefer this pan to the Farberware that I had because it's easier to clean without the raised lettering.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, easy cleanup, no-stick. I wish these were press molded rather than welded-- the seam underneath where the cup meets the pan top traps moisture and gets rusty. Tough when the product is billed as dishwasher-safe.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These were perfectly non-stick in action for the first batch. But then the muffins started sticking and coming out broken.
customer_reviews.author: August Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Weird yellow residue, do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looked great upon arrival. Washed it before using, and after cooking muffins in paper cups, a yellow residue appeared at the bottom that won't go away. It won't even wash off. I'd used the same paper cups (that are white, by the way) with other trays without issue. Just seems odd to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Priddy

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it was run through a meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: When I finally got the pan after waiting 2 weeks, I opened it to discover the coating was peeling and chipping off and that there were dents all over it. It looks like it was run through a meat grinder. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE. If I could do 0/5 stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Divine

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: If you want a heavy duty pan that will hold up this is the one the price is good making it even better have used several times and does really well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say here. Super easy to wash. Any baked on drips wash right off with ease. Bakes evenly and doesn't warp.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Minus one star for the way they attached a large label. They used glue which took forever to get off before first use.
customer_reviews.author: Fortis

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this pan
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this pan. It does have seams around the cups, but they come clean very easy. I made very sticky muffins in this pan and had absolutely no problem. They released very easily (without liners) and the pan cleaned up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this several months ago and it looks almost as good as the first time I used it. I always use soap to clean it since detergent leaves a film which over time can interfere with the non-stick property. I also prefer to use liners and a canning funnel to fill the sections which eliminates dripping on the pan and the counter. I bought a second for my granddaughter who also is delighted with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Jean

customer_reviews.title: Muffins, anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Nice, normal regular sized muffins. This pan won't warp or stick and cleans up beautifully. I make egg, cheese & bacon "mini-omelettes" in these. Pop them in the oven, pop out the finished product & there's a quick breakfast grab for the coming week to quickly heat up in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: KitchenWitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product I also use this to make little cheese biscuits. Food doesn't stick to it and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The pan is strong and doesn’t bend under the weight of food or when handling one handed. It’s very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one =)
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for several years and it eventually started rusting (from scratches and being left in the sink with water too long) so I decided to buy a replacement. I looked at some of the newer ones made out of silicone but based on the complaints posted by other reviewers about odors, food tasting funny, and floppy pans prone to spillage I decided to go with what I already knew worked.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet DissidenceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love my muffin tin! It is a great value and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these pans! Nice and sturdy, I’m expecting them to last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: RissAndCo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nice well made 12 cup muffin pan. This pan was exactly what I wanted, thank you
customer_reviews.author: K. Mauk

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great brand and great product for the price! Made some delicious Yorkshire puddings and corn bread muffins in it so far! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! So easy to clean and use! Bakes evenly and has a good weight to it
customer_reviews.author: Libby P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive pans!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best muffin pan I have ever used! Just used it for the first time today. The muffins slid out perfectly and it was so easy to clean. I did put a little butter at the bottom of each to help, but this still far exceeded my expectations. I have had expensive pans that didn't work as good as this one. With the low price on this excellent pan all I can say is BUY IT!!! You will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: KayaBear55

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even my savory, cheesy type muffins pop out of these tins with ease. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Bakun

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get to like-new clean. After first use ...
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get to like-new clean. After first use, it had burnt marks that I can't remove no matter how much I scrub.
customer_reviews.author: sJp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made pan.
customer_reviews.text: I made egg muffins and whole wheat muffins in this pan and they came right out. This is a nice heavy pan and seems to be well-constructed. I would buy again if I needed a second pan.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality! I'm thrilled and looking forward to my next batch of muffins! Triple chocolate or berry muffins! Yum!
customer_reviews.author: GypsyALB

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I just received these in the mail. One of them was already bent. I immediately returned them. The metal is not very durable and easily bent. The only reason I gave it 3 stars was because the cost equals the quality (cheap). You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Regina R

customer_reviews.title: PYREX MUFFIN PAN
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old muffin tins which were a little on the rusty side! I chose these for the non-stick quality and they lived up to that promise! Great for ease of clean-up. Size is just right for muffins made with a 2 layer cake recipe. We loved them. I would recommend them to anyone, whether replacing or starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Capicorn29

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have never made cupcakes before this was great to use and cleaned up very wasy
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Bought some more.  Really like these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few more of these. Now have 8 of them. We do larger functions. I really like these muffin tins. The non-stick surface is top notch and they are easy to clean afterwords. The material is sturdy and does not in any way feel flimsy. You won't go wrong with one or 8 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic muffin/cupcake tin
customer_reviews.text: Good muffin tin, as some other reviewers posted, there is a lip on the underside that will end up eventually collecting crumbs. That being said, I almost always use muffin cups so it doesn't really bother me. Bakes well and evenly, that does matter to me
customer_reviews.author: fencingmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Muffin Tin!
customer_reviews.text: I have used quite a few different brands of muffin tins and have found this one to be the best. My muffins always come out easily and it's very easy to wash this pan. I'm not sure if it's dishwasher safe (I didn't check) but I always hand wash it. I've found the little bit of extra effort keeps it working at it's best for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I love how the cupcakes or muffins I make never stick. I ran out of cooking spray and had to make muffins without it. Not one muffin stuck to the pan and clean up was super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non stick and durable bakes quickly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, and it's really non-stick. But it seem likes things bake/brown a little quicker in this so I have to reduce the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Thorswoman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old muffin pan because my old one was impossible to clean. This one is great. Nothing sticks and I don’t have to soak to get it clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and great price. I didn't put this in the dishwasher, which is my only complaint, although at this price, it would not be painful to replace often if I did and it got messed up. It was easy to clean by hand, however.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good price/nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy weight and quality construction. These look like they will hold up in the dishwasher as well, but have only used them once so far. Other Wilton products for baking that I've purchased in the past have not disappointed me, and these appear to be the same quality. Good price/nice product.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It is very heavy duty/sturdy and cleans up completely, leaving no residue. I plan to buy another and will try other Wilton pans to see if they are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enough for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect choice for me because I had the 6 cup one and always had to prepare 2 separate pans when I had guests. The quality of the pan is good and it's an overall nice nonstick muffin/cupcake pan
customer_reviews.author: sunshynewitme

customer_reviews.title: Can be multipurpose!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cooking cupcakes or baked egg “muffins”. Also have let my toddler play with it! He loves putting all his mini animal figures in each spot. Keeps him busy for a solid 15 minutes - which is great for a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: N. O'D

customer_reviews.title: Just in! Good
customer_reviews.text: . Good condition and quicker delivery than I expected. My plans for it almost went up in smoke signals. Fortunately I did not have to give up or in about doing a smaller single serving dishes. Did you know you can make Pot pies, Apple Pie, in them besides the average muffin and cupcakes? Join the club and replace your Pans with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Barcathy1

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't need liners or spray!
customer_reviews.text: For $5 on Black Friday, this couldn't be a better buy! Used it without liners or spray and muffins didn't stick a bit!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Thanks finally
customer_reviews.text: This is the best muffin pan I have ever had. I of course used it the first. Washes up well I used paper muffin cups I am sure when I use it without the cups it will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great cupcake tins. They clean easily and bake evenly. I like the rounded ends for easy handling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine C

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used these a few times and I'm happy so far
customer_reviews.author: 'kinley

customer_reviews.title: Great muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: Great muffin pan. I used with muffin cups. But the batter that spilled on the sides easily came off when washing. Nice quality pan.
customer_reviews.author: A. Levenson

customer_reviews.title: It's a pan that does what a non stick pan ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a pan that does what a non stick pan should doo
customer_reviews.author: R. Sun

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as described. The non-stick coating made cleaning the tin super easy, even when opting to forgo cupcake papers (also you might want to flour the pan, as if it wasn't non-stick. I always do this, regardless). It is heavy and seems as though it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality and ease of cleanup at such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pan is easy to clean due to the non stick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Cosby

customer_reviews.title: and I'm very happy with the non-stick properties
customer_reviews.text: I made lots of different recipes with this so far, and I'm very happy with the non-stick properties.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic non-stick pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are fantastic! I bought them since I have gotten into baking recently, and they are so easy to wash! Nothing sticks to them, as long as you properly wash them after they cool down. They make perfect-sized cupcakes, brownies, and muffins!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kreschollek

customer_reviews.title: This is a good, sturdy muffin tin
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, sturdy muffin tin. I always use paper liners, but the overflow that cooks on to the top of the tin always cleans up really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Even and consistent baking
customer_reviews.text: Cooks evenly and consistent. I was baking cupcakes every weekend for a few months and needed to purchase a second pan and decided to go with this one. It's sturdy and practical - good stuff! Would recommend to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wilton cupcake pans 2 pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mother who loves to bake cakes. She loves anything wilton and will tell you that you can't go wrong with the Wilton Brand. This was an awesome deal two pans for one low price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this cupcake pan...wish I had order 2...will have to do that
customer_reviews.author: Deane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pam
customer_reviews.text: Great product great quality and very easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: Joes0123

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. I can sure tell the difference with this one then my old one. Cleans up so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have used at least 20 time since purchase. Holds up great. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: travel mommy85

customer_reviews.title: wilton is the best
customer_reviews.text: wilton brand is a go-to for me in the kitchen. I have their baking sheets and now this muffin tin and it's so great. it's actually nonstick and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: dogmombk

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick
customer_reviews.text: I make egg muffins in this tin no problem. Easy to clean and sturdy construction. Would recommend for any entry level baking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect non stick pan, easy to clean and my cupcakes turn out great
customer_reviews.author: K Grasher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good standard cupcake pan for a great price. Wilton makes good products that LAST. It won't rust easily and it cleans up well. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: True Review

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan is the answer to my hours of frustrated scratching with a knife to get off burned-on muffin batter. I just insert paper liners, or not, and the non-stick surface allows for super easy cleaning. I like how it holds 12 muffins as opposed to 6, so I can get more done at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent purchase. In my country this type of pans ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent purchase. In my country this type of pans sell for around $20 or more, so the price is unbeatable. I have used this to make cupcakes about four times and it works perfectly, no sticking, easy to clean, nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Linmedina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this! She says it is much easier to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: ... heavy duty muffin pans and they do not stick love them.
customer_reviews.text: this are heavy duty muffin pans and they do not stick love them.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: Good pan... decent quality... unfortunately you have to pay for the name.... there are lots of no name brands that a lot less expensive but they are crappy... I wish someone would make one that was no name but better quality.
customer_reviews.author: PC Sales & Service

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for a friend and she loves it!!!! Great quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: It has been so nice having this muffin tin
customer_reviews.text: It has been so nice having this muffin tin! I've made egg muffins and protein muffins and they both have come out perfectly with no sticking to the muffin tin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. I would suggest to buy , no rust or sticking.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: The muffin pan for tasty muffins and more
customer_reviews.text: I bake blueberry muffins every week and they turn out so tasty!
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Love these, made well, eassy to clean and cook fantastically
customer_reviews.author: MOM

customer_reviews.title: Muffins fall right out when I use a coating of coconut oil..
customer_reviews.text: I don't need to use cupcake papers when I use this cupcake tin. If I coat it with coconut oil or ghee, my muffins don't stick!
customer_reviews.author: J. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely non-stick!
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick pan. We have used this twice to make breakfast muffins and clean up is a breeze because everything just slides right out of the cups! My wife liked it so much we bought a second to replace our old non-stick one!
customer_reviews.author: A. Nony-Mouse

product_meta.title: Wilton Recipe Right Muffin Pan, 12-Cup Non-Stick Muffin Pan
product_meta.description: Your muffins and cupcakes will pop right out without leaving anything behind in this non-stick, 12-cup muffin pan by Wilton.
feature_bullets: Bake a dozen muffins or cupcakes at once with this 12-cup pan
Made of steel; non-stick surface for easy release and quick cleanup
Cavities: 3 in. dia. x 1 in. (7.6 cm dia x 2.5 cm)
Dishwasher safe; however for best results, wash in warm, soapy water before first and after each use
